amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the order entitled "Order Accepting Proposed Tariff Revisions and Establishing a Technical Conference" issued by FERC on Aug. 13, 2013.

action.text: Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Maloney, Sean.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
